name: solana-wallets-generation
title: Solana Wallets Generation
description: Introducing the Solana Wallet Generator, a powerful Raycast extension designed for developers and cryptocurrency enthusiasts seeking to efficiently create multiple Solana wallets. This tool streamlines the wallet generation process, allowing users to produce thousands of wallets swiftly and securely.
author: uladkaminski

commands.name: swg
commands.title: swg
commands.subtitle: Solana Wallets Generation
commands.description: Generate Solana Wallets with or without public keys

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
